div.div:
Improves request template with enhanced school program details
Updates the request template to include additional fields for phone number, school name, school email, grade levels, and interested programs.
Enhances the layout and styling for better readability and structure, allowing for clearer presentation of contact and school information.
Adds optional additional information section to capture more details from the user, improving overall functionality and user experience.

Adds email template for parent/student program requests
Introduces a new component to generate a structured email template for parent or student program requests.
The template includes fields for requestor details, school information, and additional messages, improving communication and coordination with schools.
Enhances the user experience by providing a clear format for requests.
Adds RegistrationTemplate component for new class registration emails

Enhances feedback template with detailed input fields
Updates the feedback template to include additional fields for user input, improving the specificity of feedback collected.
Replaces the 'message' field with various structured inputs, including participation type, program details, ratings, and comments, allowing for more comprehensive feedback.
The design is also enhanced for better visual presentation and clarity, supporting both anonymous and identified feedback submissions.
Enhances Contact Us template with inquiry type and improved formatting for contact information

Adds ApplicationTemplate component for job application emails
Introduces a new component to generate formatted email templates for job application submissions.
The component collects applicant information, including personal details, positions of interest, availability, and submitted documents, enhancing communication during the hiring process.
This improvement aims to streamline the review of applications and ensure that all relevant information is presented clearly.

Adds school request form and enhances user communication
Introduces a new school request form component to replace the parent student request form, improving clarity for users.
Enhances the user experience with informative messaging about the response process and immediate assistance options.
Incorporates a dynamic button for direct phone calls, streamlining communication with the program.

Implements form submission with error handling
Enhances the contact form submission process by integrating an API call to send user data.
Introduces error handling to alert users in case of submission failures, ensuring a better user experience.
Resets the form fields upon successful submission to prepare for new user input.

Updates form submission handling for contact requests
Refines the POST request handling by:
- Changing fields to include `phone`, `schoolName`, `schoolEmail`, `gradeLevels`, `interestedPrograms`, and `additionalInfo`. - Enhancing validation to check for new required fields. - Modifying email subject to reflect the school name in the request.
These changes improve data accuracy and user experience in the contact request process.

Adds API endpoint for sending parent/student requests
Implements a new POST route to handle requests for the Parent/Student program.
The endpoint validates input fields and sends an email using the Resend service with a formatted template.
This addition enhances communication for program requests and ensures data integrity through basic validation.

Adds application, registration, and feedback email routes
Implements new routes for handling job applications, class registrations, and feedback submissions.
Each route includes validation for required fields and sends formatted emails using the Resend service. These changes enhance the functionality of the contact API, allowing for efficient management of user inquiries and applications.
Improves user experience by ensuring necessary data is collected before processing requests.

Adds multi-step application form with enhanced experience tracking
Implements a multi-step application form to improve user experience and streamline data collection.
Introduces progress tracking and allows users to select multiple positions and availability days. Expands experience fields for various positions, enhancing applicant information collection.
Integrates file upload functionality for resumes and cover letters, ensuring comprehensive application submissions.
Enhances validation logic to ensure all required fields are completed before progression through the form steps.
fix: update muted color variable for improved accessibility
feat: implement multi-step feedback form with progress tracking and validation
feat: enhance Contact Us form with new layout, validation, and success dialog
feat: redesign RequestFormSchool with improved layout, enhanced input components, and success dialog
feat: update RequestFormParentStudent with improved layout, added immediate assistance section, and refined form fields
feat: overhaul FeedbackForm with enhanced UI components, validation, and submission handling
feat: enhance ApplicationForm with improved validation, file upload, and user feedback dialog
feat: implement multi-step registration form with validation and progress tracking
style: remove dark theme text color from heading for consistency in StaffPage
style: remove dark theme text color from headings for consistency in OurStaffPage
style: remove dark theme text color and adjust layout for consistency in AboutUsPage
refactor: remove ThemeProvider from Providers component for simplified context management
style: remove dark theme text color from Our Programs header for consistency
style: adjust DynamicButton class for consistent spacing in FeedbackForm
refactor: improve class order and styling consistency across multiple components
style: refine typography and layout across multiple page header components
fix: adjust class order and improve styling for PageHeaderTestimonial component
feat: replace TestimonialCard with TestimonialsPaginated component for improved testimonial display
feat: add multiple testimonials for various programs to enhance user engagement
feat: add paginated testimonials component with filtering and pagination controls
feat: update color variables for improved theming; add navigation color
feat: add Radix UI components for progress, radio group, and select; update tooltip styles
Refactors card components for improved styling and structure; updates button and image classes for consistency
Refactor LearningSimulatorPage: Replace hardcoded ResourceCard components with a dynamic mapping from sorted simulators array for improved maintainability and organization.
Refactor BusinessCalculator: Replace CalculatorCard with ResourceCard; sort corresponding checklists by title for improved organization.
Refactor FinanceChecklistsPage: Add "View All" button for each checklist category; sort checklists by title for improved organization.

Refactor Calculator component: Replace CalculatorCard with ResourceCard; improve error handling for missing calculator type and corresponding calculators; sort calculators by title for better organization.
Refactor FinanceCalculatorPage: Add a "View All" button for each category, enhancing navigation; import utility for title formatting.
Refactor global styles: Remove unnecessary list style application from unordered lists for cleaner styling.
Refactor ResourceCard: Enhance layout and functionality by adding a button for resource exploration; update title formatting and ensure consistent styling.
Refactor Checklist Page: Improve layout consistency by adjusting class order and enhancing header structure; update checkbox styles for better alignment.
Refactor global styles: Update primary, secondary, and accent colors for consistency; enhance typography styles for headings and links; improve list styling.

Refactor button components across finance calculators and decision tools to use the new Button component; update styles and remove unnecessary classes for consistency. Adjust global styles for primary and secondary colors, and enhance sidebar component structure and functionality.
Refactor Financial Decision Tools Page: Update tool descriptions for clarity, enhance layout, and implement sorting for improved organization and user experience.
Refactor Finance Calculator Page: Implement sorting for finance calculators and enhance list rendering for improved organization and readability.
Refactor Financial Decision Tools page: Enhance layout, improve readability, and implement a dynamic tools grid for better user engagement.
Refactor UI components for improved layout, consistency, and readability across pricing, navigation, and portfolio sections
Refactor Stock Market Simulator UI: Enhance layout, improve accessibility, and update trading functionality with new components for better user experience.

Refactor calculator components for improved styling and consistency
- Updated layout classes in various calculator components to enhance responsiveness and maintain a consistent design. - Removed unnecessary background color classes from result display sections for a cleaner look. - Adjusted text color classes for better readability and uniformity across components. - Ensured all calculators maintain a similar structure and styling approach.

Refactor styling and improve readability across multiple finance calculator components
- Adjusted class order for consistent styling in mortgage, net profit margin, operating margin, payroll tax, pension plan, profit margin, property appreciation, property management fee, property tax, quick ratio, real estate commission, and real estate investment return calculators. - Removed unnecessary background color classes from table rows for a cleaner look. - Simplified text color classes for result displays to enhance readability. - Ensured consistent button styling across all calculators.

Refactor layout and improve readability in finance calculator pages
- Updated div class order for consistent styling across multiple calculator pages. - Adjusted text formatting for better readability in descriptions and tables. - Removed unnecessary background color classes from table headers. - Enhanced button styles for a cleaner look. - Standardized source citation formatting across calculators.
Refactors layout and styling in OurTeamPage component for improved readability and consistency
Adds Progress, Table, and Tabs components; updates package dependencies
Refactor vocabulary terms definitions for clarity and detail; enhance explanations for key programming concepts and add new terms to improve educational content.
Enhance FAQ content with detailed answers; expand on trial classes, sibling discounts, monthly plans, course differences, scholarships, and more for improved clarity and transparency.
Enhance MissionPage layout and content; improve structure, add new sections on impact, vision, and core values, and update styling for better readability and engagement
Implement student success stories page with pagination, filtering, and enhanced layout; add new UI components for better user experience
Enhance AboutPage content and layout; correct typographical errors, add historical milestones, teaching philosophy, student success stories, and community involvement sections
Refactor layout and home page components; integrate AppLayout and enhance feature display with Badge component
Refactor ParentGuidePage to enhance layout with new UI components; implement tabs and accordion for better content organization
Add secondary features to enhance curriculum offerings with detailed descriptions and icons
Implement AppLayout with sidebar and dynamic breadcrumb; remove Header and Footer components
Add Radix UI components: Badge, Dialog, Popover, Select, and Table; update package dependencies
Update color variables in globals.css for improved theme consistency
Implement sidebar component with context and mobile support; add vocabulary page and skeleton UI
Add metadata for SEO and adjust layout spacing
